sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import Card from '../components/Card'; import Badge from '../components/Badge'; const Blog = () => { const posts = [ { id: 1, title: 'How Tutors Boost CBC Language Skills in Kenyan Schools', excerpt: 'Discover how our dedicated tutors are enhancing language education in Kenyan primary schools through the CBC curriculum, creating engaging and effective learning experiences.', image: 'blog-tutor-cbc.jpg', date: 'June 1, 2025', author: 'Flency Atswenje', category: 'Education', }, { id: 2, title: 'Interactive Lessons: Engaging Young Learners with French', excerpt: 'Explore our innovative approach to teaching French to young learners through interactive games, songs, and activities that make language learning fun and memorable.', image: 'blog-interactive-french.jpg', date: 'June 5, 2025', author: 'Pearlson Team', category: 'Teaching', }, { id: 3, title: 'Cultural Benefits of German in Primary Education', excerpt: 'Learn how introducing German language and culture in primary schools broadens students\' horizons and prepares them for a globalized future.', image: 'blog-german-culture.jpg', date: 'June 8, 2025', author: 'Flency Atswenje', category: 'Culture', }, { id: 4, title: 'Preparing for the Multilingual Fest 2025', excerpt: 'Get ready for our upcoming language festival where students will showcase their multilingual talents through performances, presentations, and cultural displays.', image: 'blog-multilingual-fest.jpg', date: 'June 12, 2025', author: 'Pearlson Team', category: 'Events', }, { id: 5, title: 'Sign Language Inclusion in Kenyan Classrooms', excerpt: 'How we\'re integrating Kenyan Sign Language into our curriculum to promote inclusivity and communication skills among all students.', image: 'blog-sign-language.jpg', date: 'June 15, 2025', author: 'Flency Atswenje', category: 'Inclusion', }, { id: 6, title: 'Success Stories: Tutors Transforming Language Learning', excerpt: 'Inspiring stories from our tutors who have helped students overcome language barriers and achieve remarkable progress in their language journey.', image: 'blog-tutor-success.jpg', date: 'June 16, 2025', author: 'Pearlson Team', category: 'Success Stories', }, ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

))}

))}

); }; export default Blog;
